name: Untold Legends: Dark Kingdom
description: As members of the DRAGON SHADE, an elite squad of mystical warriors, you will embark on an epic journey to defeat a corrupt King that you once served. Appalled by the discovery of dark magic corrupting the kingdom as the King’s minions ravage the land and people, the DRAGON SHADE vow to avenge their fallen comrades and end the King’s tyranny once and for all.
